chapter.title: Additional OTRS applications - calendar
chapter.para: In OTRS 3.2, 9 calendars can be configured graphically by default. This number can be extended to 99. Calendar configuration is done in the admin interface using the SysConfig framework calendar 1 etc. links:

"TimeWorkingHours" can be used in OTRS ITSM to define so-called "service level windows" time frames in which certain service levels are guaranteed, if applicable monitored and/or evaluated to secure service level compliance.
